alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:43PM CDT until June 15 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DENTON...SOUTHEASTERN COOKE AND SOUTHWESTERN GRAYSON COUNTIES... At 1042 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pilot Point, or 13 miles northeast of Sanger, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Pilot Point, Aubrey, Collinsville, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Lake Kiowa, Southmayd, Tioga, Road Runner, Ethel, Lake Ray Roberts, Woodbine and Burns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Texas.
